name: 2 Expensive 2 Break
summary:
2 Expensive 2 Break - that name pretty much stands for itself. You are asked to control a wrecking ball - a very springy one - and break as much as possible in a given amount of time. Who cares about whose house was it anyway?
If you like simple, yet entertaining games, this one is just for you!

Features:
A very nice desert stylization
A springy wrecking ball
Lots of house pieces
Explosive barrels, which explode all right
This game already is a lot of fun, but we still plan to continue. So - stay tuned for more!

name: 2econds to Starlivht: Forever My Diamond
summary:
As graduation looms, true feelings begin to surface. Will Grace find the courage to overcome her shyness and bare her heart to Sera, or will her handsome rival Akira get to her first? A free VN about being really gay for your best friend.

Part of the Noisz series, and prequel to Noisz Starlivht.

name: 2econds to Starlivht: My Heart's Reflection
summary:
"The day I put that uniform on, I saw myself in the mirror for the first time. And I dared to think, maybe, just maybe..." A free VN about standing up to the world to be yourself.

Part of the Noisz series, and prequel to Noisz Starlivht.
